declaration.code:
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    scene: SCNScene? = nil,
    pointOfView: SCNNode? = nil,
    options: SceneView.Options = [],
    preferredFramesPerSecond: Int = 60,
    antialiasingMode: SCNAntialiasingMode = .multisampling4X,
    delegate: (any SCNSceneRendererDelegate)? = nil,
    technique: SCNTechnique? = nil
)

SceneKitSwiftUIiOS 14.0–26.0DeprecatediPadOS 14.0–26.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 14.0–26.0DeprecatedmacOS 11.0–26.0DeprecatedtvOS 14.0–26.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–26.0DeprecatedwatchOS 7.0–26.0Deprecated

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(
    scene: SCNScene? = nil,
    pointOfView: SCNNode? = nil,
    options: SceneView.Options = [],
    preferredFramesPerSecond: Int = 60,
    antialiasingMode: SCNAntialiasingMode = .multisampling4X,
    delegate: (any SCNSceneRendererDelegate)? = nil,
    technique: SCNTechnique? = nil
)
```
